title: Step 1: Solving for One Variable
text: Solve one of the equations for either variable.

title: Step 2: Using Subsitution to Create a One-Variable Equation
text: Subsitute the expression from Step 1 into the other equation.

title: Step 4: Solving for the Numerical Value of the Other Variable
text: Subsitute the solution from Step 3 into the other equation to find the value of the other variable.

title: Step 5: Checking Values
text: Check that the ordered pair is a solution to both equations.
